Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Perry
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Wentworth, 111th and Michigan due to,street blockage near 115th/Perry.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses  are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Wentworth, 111th and Michigan due to,street blockage near 115th/Perry.

Allow extra travel time.
